item.title: Day 5 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: The idiographic system method in psychopathology Process monitoring (experience sampling) Dynamic complexity (Multiplex) Recurrence networks Early warning signals of phase transitions in multivariate time series data Tentative time table for Day 5 When What Who Topics Notes 09:00-10:00 Intro Idiographic Methods FH 10:00-10:30 Dynamic complexity as an early warning signal in psychopathology MO 10.
